description_jp: 最大SPの3%SPゲージを獲得し次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のテクニックの17%増加
description_en: Gain 3% of max SP Gauge, and Voltage gained by next SP Skill increases by 17% of own Technique

effect.display: Gain 3% of SP capacity as SP Gauge
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of SP capacity as SP Gauge

effect.display: Gain 17% of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
